SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PLAN ADMINISTRATOR HAS ANALYZED THE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE PLAN AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT, AS OF JUNE 30, 2022, THERE ARE NO UNCERTAIN POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN THAT WOULD REQUIRE RECOGNITION OF A LIABILITY OR ASSET OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
NONDISCRIMINATION PUBLICITY POLICY NONDISCRIMINATION POLICIES ARE PUBLICIZED TO PARTICIPANTS THROUGH LABOR AGREEMENTS THAT SERVE THE JURISDICTION OF THE APPRENTICE FUND.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE TRUSTEES FOR APPROVAL PRIOR TO SIGNATURE AND SUBMISSION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS PLEDGE AT MEETINGS THAT NO CONFLICTS OF INTEREST EXIST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL SALARIES ARE DETERMINED AND AGREED UPON BY A CLOSED MEETING OF EXECUTIVE BOARD MEMBERS. OFFICERS OR KEY EMPLOYEES WHOSE SALARIES ARE BEING DISCUSSED ARE NOT PRESENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
